CustomField.description: Looks up Confirmed Shoot Date - Start and End Fields and displays Date Fields as Text Fields Used in Pandadoc Integration to display Date Fields in more beautiful (text) method
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Looks up Confirmed Shoot Date - Start and End Fields and displays Date Fields as Text Fields Used in Pandadoc Integration to display Date Fields in more beautiful (text) method
CustomField.label: zPandadoc - Shoot Date - Text - Full
